title: Consider using some faster than named pipes alternative for cross process communication
body: @rokonec suggested this idea during our planning meetings. I'll leave it up to you to fill in this section with what we might be able to expect out of this, and what the path forward is here.

nodes.body: CSPROJ OOP uses some C# based IPC using shared memory. I'd try to implement fast prototype using it and measure it.
Lowered priority, due to complexity, security implications, and low expected perf gain
